desc: Introducing Halo Sport 2, the brain stimulator that helps you develop muscle memory faster. Gain skill, strength, and endurance 45% faster. Be your best: break through plateaus & set PRs. Increase neuroplasticity and accelerate learning in the motor cortex. Backed by 4,000+ peer-reviewed studies.

layout.text: HALO NEUROSCIENCE PARTNERS WITH BERKLEE COLLEGE OF MUSIC TO ACCELERATE MUSIC LEARNING IN THE BRAIN.
